survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of the local community recycling program to identify areas for improvement and expansion.

questions.question_text: How often do you use the community recycling bins?
questions.client_notes: Suggested scale: Frequency-based options to gauge usage patterns.

script.question_text: How often do you use the community recycling bins?

questions.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice to understand common recycling behaviors.
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox selection with an open-ended option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of materials do you typically recycle? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', or 'Monthly' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to recycle more often?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative feedback for program enhancements.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to recycle more often?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current locations of recycling bins in your community?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale to measure satisfaction with bin locations.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current locations of recycling bins in your community?

questions.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with the recycling program? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to identify specific challenges participants face.

script.question_text: Have you encountered any issues with the recycling program? If yes, please describe.
